Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: I'm so sick of these pushy pharmaceutical reps.#$b#If they wanted me to prescribe their stuff, they need to make it more affordable.$a
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: I hate how scientific studies aren't properly vetted these days by the journals, and how it's so hard to get information about retractions.

Entries.8_2: Ugh, I've got so much continuing education to do, and I'm not sure when I'll have the time...
Entries.18_2: I wish advertisements were more honest about what people actually look like.#$b#Maintaining such a low body fat percentage for any real amount of time is terrible for your health.
Entries.19_2: %Harvey looks dejected.#$b#*sigh*. @, my own A1c is a tad bit higher than I'd like.#$b#I really need to start taking better care of myself, but with what time?$s

Entries.5_2: I really wanted to partner with a telehealth agency to offer services I'm not trained for, like counseling, but then I found out they sold patient data.$s#$e#Money ruins everything, doesn't it?$s
Entries.12_2: Every time a new weight loss drug comes out, I'm always afraid it's too good to be true.
Entries.15_2: I always worry so much about whether or not my patients can afford the medications I prescribe them.$s

Entries.6_2: %Harvey looks exhausted.#$e#Oh, hi @! I'm sorry, I was up late yesterday arguing with the preapprover.#$b#I wish they'd let doctors doctor and stop trying to micromanage us.$s
Entries.7_2: The preapprovers are getting even more tight-fisted. Now they only want to reimburse for the first fifteen minutes of a checkup.$a
Entries.10_2: Nutritional studies always confuse me, @. First, a paper comes out saying milk is good for you. Next, a paper claims milk is bad.#$b#I'm not sure what I should believe anymore.$s
Entries.13_2: One of my friends from med school is now taking pilot lessons. Wants to fly planes as a hobby.#$b#It's a lot more expensive than what I expected...$s#$b#He's a big city doctor, though, he's pulling in the big bucks.
Entries.15_2: Is alcohol good or bad for the heart? I feel like the studies say different things every year.$s
Entries.22_2: I'd complain about how many faxes I still have to send but frankly all our computer systems also only barely work.$s#$e#One day someone will come out with an electronic health record system that's actually good, hopefully.
Entries.23_2: %place Biologics just came out with a new medication for type 1 diabetes. 20,000g an infusion. Who can afford that?
Entries.24_2: I like taking walks around town whenever I can. I think it's good for one's mental health.$h

Entries.13_2: That friend of mine, the one who's taking pilot lessons? He had to make a crash landing in a field the other day.#$b#Engine failed, it was pretty scary.
Entries.16_2: One of my friends from medical school is now a company doc.#$e#He says the pay is stable but he always has to be careful what he says.#$b#Company doesn't want to admit that it has asbestos surrounding its buried lines.#$e#Oh, I shouldn't have said that!
Entries.19_2: We've got these new lateral flow virus detectors, but boy are they expensive.#$b#They'll tell you the difference between respiratory syncytial virus and the flu in fifteen minutes, but cost nearly 500g a pop.
